Model 		ROG Rapture GT-BE98		RT-BE96U
CPU		2.6GHz (Quad-core)		2.6GHz (Quad-core)
Memory		256MB Flash, 2GB DDR4 RAM	256MB Flash, 2GB DDR4 RAM
Wi-Fi Standard	Wi-Fi 7				Wi-Fi 7
Wi-Fi Band      2.4GHz: 1376 Mbps (4096-QAM)	2.4GHz: 1376 Mbps (4096-QAM)
 	   5GHz: 5765 Mbps (4096-QAM 160MHz)	5GHz: 5765 Mbps (4096-QAM 160MHz)
 	   5GHz: 5765 Mbps (4096-QAM 160MHz)	6GHz: 11530 Mbps (4096-QAM 320MHz)
 	  6GHz: 11530 Mbps (4096-QAM 320MHz)	 
Antennas	8				8
Ports	  1x 10Gbps WAN/LAN, 1x 10Gbps LAN, 	1x 10Gbps WAN/LAN, 1x 10Gbps LAN, 
	  1x 2.5Gbps WAN/LAN, 3x 2.5Gbps LAN,  	1x 1Gbps WAN/LAN, 3x 1Gbps LAN, 
	  1x 1Gbps LAN, 1x USB 3.2, 1x USB 2.0 		1x USB 3.2, 1x USB 2.0

game mode, ASUS features: AiMesh, AiProtection :FCC ID: MSQ-RTBE6G00 (2023-10-03) *[[ASUS GT-BE98]] • [[ASUS ROG Rapture GT-BE98]] • Wi-Fi 7 (BE25000) •
